values: We Believe (2): The Doctrine of SalvationWe Believe (2): The Doctrine of Salvation

Pastor Steve Jeffery walks us through the doctrine of salvation: what it means for God to deliver us from our sins, what the deep grace of God does, and what effect that it has. Visit our website: https://www.allsaintskirk.com Worship with us: 11:00 AM Sundays
